stadium.name: The Guilder's Field
stadium.description: An opulent stadium sponsored by the powerful Merchant's Guild. The stands feature luxurious, velvet-lined boxes for bankers, who are often more focused on making deals than the game.

stats.pregame_ritual: Washing their hands with dirt.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Meticulously cleaning each stud on their boots with a special brush.
Eating a raw onion, layer by layer, without crying.
Getting a teammate to pour a bucket of cold water over their head.
A team-wide moment of absolute silence to 'gather their thoughts'.
Sharpening the edges of their blunted weapon (an exercise in futility).
Humming a tune they believe only they know.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.

stadium.name: The Old Fort
stadium.description: The team plays within the crumbling, stone-ringed ruins of an ancient hill-fort. The 'runes' are just old, weathered carvings on the standing stones that serve as obstacles.

stats.pregame_ritual: Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Spitting into their own hand and then slapping their face with it.
Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
A toast of goat's milk to the health of their rivals.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.

preGame:
# üèÜ PLAYOFFS: GAME TWO - SURVIVAL AT THE GUILDER'S FIELD! üèÜ

Greetings, sports fans, ghouls, and money-grubbers! This is your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you LIVE from **The Guilder's Field** in New Prosperity! The atmosphere today is absolutely suffocating‚Äîand I don't just mean the smog from the nearby counting houses! We are in the thick of the playoffs, and the tension is high enough to make a soul-contract snap! The **New Prosperity Profits** are backed into a corner after dropping Game 1, and the local fans‚Äîmostly bankers in velvet-lined boxes‚Äîare looking more nervous than a tax-evader in a truth-circle! 

I‚Äôve been watching the pre-game rituals, and let me tell you, the dedication to the craft is beautiful! **Yoshi Cathy** is over there systematically dismantling a raw onion with his bare teeth, weeping like a fey prince who lost his favorite mirror! Talk about focus! On the other side, the **Kerlauger Runeguard** are keeping it classy but creepy. **Harilda Sigsmond** is leading a chant that‚Äôs getting louder and more ominous by the second, enough to give those soft-headed 'heroes' like Sir Tanos a permanent headache! 

We‚Äôre playing on the Profits' home turf today, and the **Market Fluctuation** is in full swing! The **Hired Hecklers** are already screaming insults about the Runeguard's ancestry, and the Merchant's Guild has clearly spared no expense to ensure a hostile environment. Will the Runeguard sweep the series and send the Profits to the loser's bracket? Or will the power of the purse prevail? The Haven Lights would probably be too busy polishing their halos to handle this kind of pressure, but we‚Äôre here for the carnage! Let‚Äôs get the troll head rolling! ü•Çüí∞
postGame:
# üèÅ POST-GAME WRAP-UP: A CAPITAL GAIN FOR THE PROFITS! üèÅ

What a spectacular display of financial and physical dominance! Grab your grog and pull up a chair, because Game 2 of this Best-of-Three series was a total bloodbath that would make my boss, Lord Orzalon, weep with joy! The **New Prosperity Profits** have defended their turf and kept their playoff dreams alive with a hard-fought **5 to 3** victory over the Kerlauger Runeguard! We are headed to a Game 3, folks, and I haven't been this excited since I saw Sir Artorias trip over his own cape!

The game started with a literal bang! Right after the halftime break, **Reginauld Cordell** scooped up the head in the Home 2-Point zone, looking to extend Kerlauger's series lead. But the highlight of the early play was a breathtaking connection: **Lon Gabriell** fired a pass across the field to **Shepperd Trefler**, who was lurking in the End Zone. Trefler didn't miss a beat, dunking that troll head into the goal for a quick 1-point lead! The Runeguard fans were howling, but the Hired Hecklers in the stands were just getting warmed up!

The Profits didn't let the early deficit dampen their spirits. **Faina Hendrix** snatched the ball in Center Field, and the physical play intensified immediately. **Lashondra Niehaus** tried to put a stop to **Krueger Jacinthe**, but Jacinthe blocked her like a vault door! The Runeguard defense was scrambling as **Pellikka Concettina** and **Abramson Doxia** made aggressive runs toward the goal. You could see the desperation in the Profits' eyes; they weren't about to let their season end in a velvet-lined box!

Then, the real Trollball began‚Äîthe kind where people stop breathing! **Abramson Doxia** absolutely leveled **Vivia Namara**, sending her to the healers with a crunch that echoed off the Merchant Guild‚Äôs towers! Not to be outdone, **Harilda Sigsmond** retaliated by injuring **Gladdie Farika**, and **Lon Gabriell** followed up by taking out **Pellikka Concettina**! It was a beautiful cycle of violence, just as the gods of Osterra intended! Even the bankers were standing up and cheering for the sight of spilled blood!

As regulation wound down, the Profits finally found their rhythm. **Faina Hendrix**, the man of the hour, broke through the Runeguard line and sprinted into the End Zone, slamming the ball home to tie it up! The roar from the crowd was louder than a Hostile Takeover! **Benjie Foulk** tried to regain the lead for Kerlauger, but **Boleslaw Heathcote**‚Äîlikely still smelling of parchment smoke‚Äîdelivered a tackle that sent Foulk straight to the healer‚Äôs tent! With the score knotted up, we headed into **SUDDEN DEATH OVERTIME**!

Overtime was a masterclass in playoff pressure. The healers worked overtime to get everyone back on the field, but the peace lasted about three seconds. **Milman Galvan** of the Profits wasted no time, tackling **Lon Gabriell** and sending her back to the sidelines with an injury! The Runeguard were looking ragged, and **Faina Hendrix** capitalized by flattening **Lashondra Niehaus**! It was a total breakdown of the Kerlauger line, and I loved every agonizing second of it!

The Runeguard had one last gasp of defiance. **Shepperd Trefler**, showing why he‚Äôs a playoff threat, went on a rampage! He managed to injure **Krueger Jacinthe** and then immediately turned around to take out **Pellikka Concettina** again! For a moment, it looked like the Runeguard might hold the line through sheer brutality. The atmosphere was so thick with tension you could have traded it on the open market for a profit!

But then, the moment that defined the match arrived. **Pulchi Benyamin**, who I saw eating dandelions earlier, proved that weeds are the breakfast of champions! Standing right in the Center Field, Pulchi took aim while the defense was distracted by the carnage. She let out a roar and launched the troll head. It sailed through the air like a phoenix‚Äîor a very ugly bird‚Äîand cleared the goal from distance! A **2-point SHOOT** to end the game! The Profits win 5-3!

The Profits showed today that they have more than just deep pockets‚Äîthey have the stomach for a fight! They‚Äôve leveled the series at 1-1, forcing a do-or-die Game 3! The Runeguard will have to dig deep into those ancient ruins of theirs if they want to bounce back from this. I haven't seen this much medical magic used since Morgwae tried to heal Sir Tanos' bruised ego! 

Speaking of egos, I bet the Guild of the Black Sky is feeling pretty smug right now. Chairman Brennen Farno is probably counting his winnings already! But don't count out the Kerlauger crew just yet; they‚Äôve got those runes on their side, and they‚Äôre hungry for a comeback. Will the Profits secure the series, or will the Runeguard find one last bit of grit in the dirt? 

That's all for tonight's report! This is Nok the Corrupter, reminding you that in Trollball, the only thing more valuable than gold is a solid tackle to the face! Stay tuned for Game 3, it's going to be a real soul-shredder! Goodnight, Osterra, and may your favorite team be as ruthless as a debt collector! ü•ÇüíÄüí∏
